title: Admin panel

supabase.title: Supabase
supabase.desc: The MySK database is stored in Supabase and fetched via MySK API. View and edit tables in its dashboard.

schedule.title: Schedule editor
schedule.desc: Correct any schedule import errors of any classroom using tools meant for teachers.
schedule.empty: Load a schedule to get started.

warning: Any changes made in this panel will immediately affect users. Proceed with caution.
